events.name: cart-saved
events.description: This event gets fired whenever an cart gets saved.

events.name: order-created
events.description: This event gets fired whenever an new order gets created.

events.name: order-updated
events.description: This event gets fired whenever an order gets modified.

events.name: order-deleted
events.description: This event gets fired whenever an order gets deleted.

events.name: product-created
events.description: This event gets fired whenever a new product gets created.

events.name: product-changed
events.description: This event gets fired whenever a product gets modified.

events.name: product-deleted
events.description: This event gets fired whenever a product gets deleted.
